title: Try the all-new Domino’s #DriveAndPick
description: Giving you the perfect reason to go for a Drive. Introducing Domino\'s Drive-N-Pick, that you can avail exclusively on the Domino\'s App.Here\'s how to opt for the service:Step 1: Open the Domino\'s App and choose the Takeaway OptionStep 2: Choose the nearest store, opt for Drive-N-Pick and enter your vehicle detailsStep 3: You can opt for Drive-N-Pick now or for later by choosing Advance OrderingStep 4: Reach the designated pick up spot of your store and click the \'I Am Here\' buttonStep 5: Enjoy your hot and fresh delight from the store to your car door.Zero Waiting | Zero Contact | Zero Delivery ChargeDownload the App Now: http://bit.ly/3inxJBbDomino\'s #DriveAndPick']

title: Introducing Domino’s #DriveAndPick
description: What if we tell you that your favourite Domino\'s Pizza can be delivered straight from our store while you conveniently stay in your car? Introducing Domino\'s Drive-N-Pick, that you can avail exclusively on the Domino\'s App. Here\'s how to opt for the service:Step 1: Open the Domino\'s App and Select Drive N Pick.Step 2: Choose the nearest store and enter your vehicle details.Step 3: You can opt for Drive-N-Pick now or for later by choosing Advance OrderingStep 4: Reach the designated pick up spot of your store and click the \'I Am Here\' buttonStep 5: Enjoy your hot and fresh delight from our store to your car.Zero Waiting | Zero Contact | Zero Delivery ChargeDownload the Domino\'s App now: http://bit.ly/3inxJBb']

title: Foodka x Domino\'s Pasta Pizza
description: Foodka and Bhaipo are torn between Pasta and Pizza for their Pujo bhuribhoj plan. Domino\'s comes to the rescue with the all new Pasta Pizzas! An unique fusion of creamy pasta on top of cheesy pizzas! Eibaar kar Durga Pujo party hobe Pasta Pizza party! title: Everyday Value is Back!
description: Double the craving, Double the cheesy fun! Gather your family, have those memorable conversations and give yourself a break today from cooking because we have you covered. Your favourite #EveryDayValue offer is back, now enjoy 2 pizzas starting at INR 99/ each and save up to 40%! Available exclusively on the Domino\'s App and website. Go ahead and indulge in the safest cravings out there because #OrderKarnaSafeHai.At Domino’s, we also take the safety of your family very seriously. We follow stringent safety norms right from the kitchen to your doorstep, so that it’s safe for you to drool, it’s safe for you to stare, it’s safe for you to crave and it’s safe for you to order. Some of the critical measures we have taken are:🍕Our pizzas are baked at 465 F and are safe for your consumption.🍕Our hot and fresh pizzas are untouched by hand and are delivered to you with Zero Contact Delivery.🍕We are accepting only digital payments for you to have a truly zero contact experience.Order now - bit.ly/2vVFwT3#DominosCares #DominosFoodSoldiers #SafeCravings #StayHome #StaySafe #SocialDistancing #ZeroContactDelivery #NoContactDelivery #Dominos #DominosPizza #DominosPizzaIndia #Quarantine #QuarantineLife #Friends #Family #Fun #LoveUDominos #SafelyDelivered #OrderKarnaSafeHai #SafeToCrave']

title: Domino\'s introduces Zero Contact Takeaway
description: Fresh toppings? Cheese burst?Aromatic oregano?Hot and Fresh delights? Did we get you dreaming about our pizzas already? Put your worries aside, as it is #SafeToCrave. Domino’s introduces Zero Contact Takeaway, now you can also enjoy hot and fresh pizzas quickly and safely by picking it up from over 1,300 Domino\'s stores across the country with no waiting and a complete Zero Contact experienceTakeaway your Pizza safe and fast by ordering in advance. Domino’s Great Taste.Delivered Safe.
description: At Domino’s we go the extra mile to make you smile. We are taking all the possible and necessary precautions, so you can enjoy your favorite Domino’s Pizzas with loved ones in the safety of your homes. Our kitchens are open in over 150 cities. Just download the latest version of Domino’s app to check the status of your neighborhood store and order yourself a cheesy delight with Zero Contact Delivery.But there are still many of you that we aren\'t able to reach. Trust us we are trying our best to reach you as soon as the situation permits. Keep your spirits up and we will win this together. Domino’s. Great Taste. title: Enjoy Flat ₹100 Off* on 1st App Order*. Use Code: FIRSTPIZZA. Zero Contact Delivery.
description: Download the latest Domino\'s App Now & Enjoy Flat ₹100 Off on Your 1st App Order*. Use Code: FIRSTPIZZAGet your order delivered hygienic and at a safe distance through Domino\'s Zero Contact Delivery. With Zero Contact Delivery, our Safe Delivery Experts will deliver hot and fresh Domino’s Pizza without coming in contact with you. In addition, all our Safe Delivery Experts are company employees, and their temperature is checked and recorded every day. We also follow strict hygiene and sanitation protocols, which have now been further strengthened.#SafelyDelivered']

title: 20 Second Hand Wash Protocol
description: Hi, I am Bharath from Domino’s, Chennai. I follow the 20-second handwash protocol and sanitise my hands every hour. This is one of the many steps we are taking for your safety. Our temperature is checked and recorded every day. We sanitise our hands before and after delivery of the order. Our restaurants, bikes, bike boxes and hot bags are being sanitized every 4 hours. These are tough times and we are trying our best to get you your favourite pizza delivered through Zero Contact Delivery.But since only limited restaurants are open for delivery,\xa0please use the latest version of the Domino\'s App to check the status of your neighbourhood store, pay digitally and we will make a Zero Contact Delivery as soon as possible.#WeWillWinThisTogether. title: Domino’s Essentials Service with Zero Contact Delivery
description: Our #DominosFoodSoldiers are proud to deliver everyday grocery essentials to customers without them having to step outside the safety of their homes via Zero Contact Delivery. After Bangalore, Domino’s Essentials service is now also available in select areas of Delhi NCR, Mumbai, Hyderabad and Kolkata. We are now delivering combo packs of essentials like Atta, Spices, Milk, Burger Buns and Milk Powder. We are putting our best efforts to offer this service in other parts of the country also.So if you need your supply of Essentials home-delivered, order using the latest version of Domino’s App, pay digitally and we will deliver your order without coming in direct contact with you through Zero Contact Delivery.#DominosFoodSoldiers #SafeCravings #Lockdown21 #DominosEssentials #StayHome #StaySafe #SocialDistancing #SocialDistancing #ZeroContactDelivery #NoContactDelivery #Dominos #DominosPizza #DominosPizzaIndia #Quarantine #QuarantineLife #QuarantineAndChill #Friends #Family #Fun #DominosCares #SafeCravingsAgain #SafelyDelivered']

title: Great Taste. Delivered Safe.
description: Great Taste. Delivered Safe.We at Domino’s Pizza are committed to the highest standards of health, hygiene and safety. Your safety, and the safety of our delivery crew and restaurant teams, has always been our foremost priority.We wish to share with you some specific measures that we have adopted: • All our delivery riders are company employees and are hired after stringent medical checks• Employee temperature screening is done every day• All our employees are following a sanitation protocol of ‘20-second hand wash’ every hour• Once every 4 hours, we are sanitizing our restaurants, delivery bikes, delivery bike boxes and pizza delivery hot bags• Masks are being worn by our safe delivery experts as a precaution For any further queries please reach out to guestcaredominos@jublfood.com -Team Domino’s#SafelyDelivered']
